StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [InsertCandidateEduca.on]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
(@MarineCandidateID int ,@SchoolCode int ,@Educa.onLevel varchar(2) ,@SchoolEndDate date.me ,@Educa.onTier varchar(2) ,@Educa.onCode char(1) ,@CivilianEduca.onMajorCode varchar(2) ,@ProjectedComple.onDate date.me --,@FirstSenior char(1) ,@Veri.ca.on varchar(10) --,@Cumula.veGPA .oat --,@HighMathLevel varchar(2) --,@CurrentGPA .oat --,@CreditHours int --,@FullTimeStudent char(1) ,@ProjectedTier int ,@UserLogin varchar(15)) AS
IF ((SELECT MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID FROM CANDIDATE_EDUCATION WHERE SCHOOL_CODE = @SchoolCode AND MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @MarineCandidateID) IS NULL) BEGIN
INSERT INTO [dbo].[CANDIDATE_EDUCATION] ([MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID] ,[SCHOOL_CODE] ,[EDUCATION_LEVEL] ,[SCHOOL_END_DATE] ,[EDUCATION_TIER] ,[EDUCATION_CODE] ,[CIVILIAN_EDUCATION_MAJOR_CODE] ,[PROJECTED_COMPL_DATE] --,[FIRST_SENIOR] ,[VERIFICATION] --,[CUMULATIVE_GPA] --,[HIGH_MATH_LEVEL] --,[CURRENT_GPA] --,[CREDIT_HOURS] --,[FULL_TIME_STUDENT] ,[PROJECTED_TIER] ,[USER_LOGIN] ,[UPDATE_DATE]) VALUES (@MarineCandidateID ,@SchoolCode ,@Educa.onLevel ,@SchoolEndDate ,@Educa.onTier ,@Educa.onCode ,@CivilianEduca.onMajorCode ,@ProjectedComple.onDate --,@FirstSenior ,@Veri.ca.on --,@Cumula.veGPA --,@HighMathLevel --,@CurrentGPA --,@CreditHours --,@FullTimeStudent ,@ProjectedTier ,@UserLogin ,GetDate()) END
